content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs, research set to automation; status NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 10232.
- ElectricityGroup with id=10232 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) now in NO_FUEL status with warning “out of fuel”; fuel inventory empty; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_box containing approximately 200 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [37948] and steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [37948].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37948 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37949 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37950 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37955 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37954 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37959 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37958 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37961 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.
- Note: Repeated pipeline connection attempts from the Boiler output to the Steam Engine have been aborted due to no working PipeGroup being found.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
─ Fluid System Identifier Mismatch and Invalid ID Usage:
  • Multiple pipeline connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [37604, 37647, 37690, 37733, 37776, 37819, 37862, 37905] failed. Always verify and use the current valid fluid_system (now [37948]) provided by the boiler or offshore pump.
─ Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  • Rely on dynamic connectivity checks rather than fixed delays to ensure PipeGroup readiness before initiating connection attempts.
─ Persistently Failed Pipeline Connections:
  • Confirm that source and target connection points are unobstructed and compatible to enable successful fluid transfer.
─ Fuel Supply Management:
  • Ensure the boiler is sufficiently fueled to avoid entering a NO_FUEL state prior to pipeline connection attempts.
